attributes.additional_details: On top of the physical benefits of going to the gym regular exercise can have a profoundly positive impact on depression, anxiety, and ADHD. It also relieves stress, improves memory, helps you sleep better, and boosts your overall mood.
attributes.background: Ensure that gyms remain open even under the most severe coronavirus restrictions. Acknowledge gyms importance and identify them as an essential service.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Prevent gyms closing due to a spike in Covid 19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333869

Keep gyms and leisure facilities open during any lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556956
